about_the_game:
Embark on a serene and immersive survival adventure in "Beacon of the Bellrock." As a dedicated member of the Intergalactic Navy, your mission is to establish a beacon of hope in the uncharted wilderness. Your goal: Build and maintain a lighthouse that will guide spacefarers safely through the cosmic void.

Key Features:


🌌 Intergalactic Royal Navy Orders:
Answer the call of duty as a member of the Intergalactic Navy. Your mission is to construct a beacon on the Bellrock planet, ensuring the safety of passing spacecraft.

🏡 Build and Customize:
Start with a basic outpost and evolve it into a fully functional lighthouse. Design and customize your shelter, ensuring it withstands the diverse weather conditions of Bellrock.

🦉 Wildlife Haven:
Immerse yourself in the tranquility of Bellrock's wilderness. Encounter and appreciate a variety of wild birds such as partridges, grouses, and eiderducks, along with charming animals like hares, raccoons, and stoats.

⚒️ Resource Gathering:
Explore the rich, procedurally generated environment to gather resources for your construction. Harvest materials, hunt for food, and uncover hidden treasures to enhance your lighthouse.

🌿 Peaceful Survival:
Experience a survival game with a peaceful twist. While challenges exist, the focus is on creating a harmonious coexistence with the vibrant wildlife and stunning landscapes.

"Beacon of the Bellrock" offers a unique survival experience, blending peaceful exploration with the responsibility of guiding others through the cosmos. Join us on Bellrock and become the beacon that lights the way in the vast intergalactic ocean.

  • Graphics: 2 GB Dedicated Memory
  • DirectX: Version 11

short_description: Beacon of the Bellrock is a small open-world farming/building game, where you as James Hocken have to build and equip a lighthouse for the Intergalactic Royal Navy. Be the guiding light in the vast intergalactic ocean!
